metadata.Title: CVE-2021-30465 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - high
metadata.Description:
runc before 1.0.0-rc95 allows a Container Filesystem Breakout via DirectoryTraversal. To exploit the vulnerability, an attacker must be able to createmultiple containers with a fairly specific mount configuration. The problemoccurs via a symlink-exchange attack that relies on a race condition.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-30465` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

runc - 1.0.0~rc93-0ubuntu1~18.04.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: runc package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.0.0~rc93-0ubuntu1~18.04.2').
